hive.config package¶

hive.config.config_builder module¶

class hive.config.config_builder.ConfigBuilder[source]¶

Bases: object

T = ~T¶
classmethod build(default_config, required_config, config_constructor, config=None)[source]¶

constructs a Config from a configuration Dict :type default_config: Dict :param default_config: a dictionary containing default config values :type required_config: Dict[str, type] :param required_config: a dictionary containing required keys and their expected types :type config_constructor: Callable[[Dict], Union[Exception, T]] :param config_constructor: a function that takes a dict and builds a Config object :type config: Dict :param config: the Dict containing attributes to load for this Config :rtype: Union[Exception, T] :return: a Config, or, an error
